channel.title: PS3 Game Saves
channel.description: Here i will be posting some game saves for you lazy people who want to do your PS3 games easily Tutorial on how to use: Extract the file to a USB stick and then plug into your PS3 and play. If you already have done this with another game file just copy the folder within 'SAVEDATA' to the same folder on your memory stick [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XT0ORJDA]Lego Star Wars 100% complete[/URL] [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8XURN6IW]Motorstorm 100% complete[/URL] [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OI413Q91]COD4 All missions, Arcade mode and cheats unlocked[/URL] [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6WW8M2Z3]GT5 Prologue All 71 cars[/URL] [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3PBBTGK6]R:FOM 100% complete[/URL] I cbf to upload all of them right now i will add more you want a particualar one i will get for you

item.title: PS3 Game Saves
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Here i will be posting some game saves for you lazy people who want to do your PS3 games easily
Tutorial on how to use:
Extract the file to a USB stick and then plug into your PS3 and play.
If you already have done this with another game file just copy the folder within ‘SAVEDATA’ to the same folder on your memory stick
Lego Star Wars 100% complete
Motorstorm 100% complete
COD4 All missions, Arcade mode and cheats unlocked
GT5 Prologue All 71 cars
R:FOM 100% complete
I cbf to upload all of them right now i will add more you want a particualar one i will get for you
